DOC.brief_summary: This trial is conducted in South Africa. The aim of this trial is to investigate Long term safety of biphasic insulin aspart 30 in juveniles with type 1 diabetes previously treated in trial BIAsp-1240.
DOC.brief_title: Long Term Safety of Biphasic Insulin Aspart 30 in Juveniles With Type 1 Diabetes
DOC.mesh_term: Insulin degludec, insulin aspart drug combination
Insulin aspart, insulin aspart protamine drug combination 30:70
DOC.criteria: Signed informed consent obtained before any trialrelated activities according to local requirements. (Trialrelated activities are any procedure that would not have been performed during normal management of the subject) The subject must have completed the trial BIAsp1240
